dcterms:creator: A. Geiger
P. Lenz
R. Urtasun
dcterms:description: The KITTI depth completion dataset contains 42949 pair depth maps for training, 3426 pair depth maps for validation, and 1000 frames for testing. The ground truth depth maps are generated by registering 11 LiDAR scans temporally and further refined with the corresponding stereo image pairs.
dcterms:title: KITTI depth completion dataset
